

=== Download Chess PGN ===

   Welcome in my PGN section. You will find here Grand Master chess games
   in PGN format. I choose the games where one of the players has more
   than 2400 points, without forgotten, of course, the oldest games. The
   numbers between brackets give the average elo for every PGN files.
